title: Varrock Palace Secret Guard

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Varrock Palace Secret Guard is a secret organisation within Varrock. They are seen mostly in the What Lies Below quest. Their job is to protect King Roald from the Dagon'hai, a mysterious Zamorakian order, and many other Zamorakian assassins. Varrock has an anti-Zamorakian policy, enraging many followers. During What Lies Below, they recapture Surok Magis, the new leader of the Dagon'hai, and again imprison him in the Varrock Palace Library.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Varrock Palace Secret Guard
Varrock Palace Secret Guard
Released 27 March 2007 (Update)
Headquarters Varrock Palace
Locations Varrock

The Varrock Palace Secret Guard is a secret organisation within Varrock. They are seen mostly in the What Lies Below quest. Their job is to protect King Roald from the Dagon'hai, a mysterious Zamorakian order, and many other Zamorakian assassins. Varrock has an anti-Zamorakian policy, enraging many followers. During What Lies Below, they recapture Surok Magis, the new leader of the Dagon'hai, and again imprison him in the Varrock Palace Library.

Known members[edit | edit source]

  • Zaff
  • Rat Burgiss
  • The player (temporary)

See also[edit | edit source]

  • Varrock
  • What Lies Below
  • Dagon'hai

'''The Varrock Palace Secret Guard''' is a secret organisation within [[Varrock]]. They are seen mostly in the [[What Lies Below]] quest. Their job is to protect [[King Roald]] from the [[Dagon'hai]], a mysterious [[Zamorak]]ian order, and many other Zamorakian assassins. Varrock has an anti-Zamorakian policy, enraging many followers. During [[What Lies Below]], they recapture [[Surok Magis]], the new leader of the [[Dagon'hai]], and again imprison him in the [[Varrock Palace]] Library.

==Known members==
*[[Zaff]]
*[[Rat Burgiss]]
*[[Player_character|The player]] (temporary)

==See also==
